CustomField.formula:
IMAGE( IF(TEXT(Rate_your_training__c) = "1" , "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(TEXT(Rate_your_training__c) = "2" , "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(TEXT(Rate_your_training__c) = "3" , "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(TEXT(Rate_your_training__c) = "4" , "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF(TEXT(Rate_your_training__c) = "5" , "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "/img/samples/stars_000.gif" ))))),
"No Rating", 25,75)
CustomField.label: Training Rating
